title: View Last Commit
description: In this lab, you will learn how to view the last commit made to a Git repository, which is a crucial feature of the popular version control system Git.

meta.title: View Last Commit in Git
meta.description: Learn how to view the last commit made to a Git repository, including the commit message, author, and date.
meta.keywords: version control, git labs, commit author, git, commit message, last commit, git playground

verify.name: Verify for successful view
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
